name: adv
label: Advanced Settings
help_text: Provides more advanced spacing and styling ability.

children.name: padding_top
children.label: Padding Top
children.help_text: Adjusts the amount of space between this module's content and the top of the module. The numbers are not a px value they are different spacing presets 0 being no space, to the max being a lot of space. These presets force a level of site-wide consistency in spacing but allow for lots of flexibility.

children.name: padding_bottom
children.label: Padding Bottom
children.help_text: adjusts the amount of space between this modules content and the bottom of the module.

children.name: margin_top
children.label: Margin Top
children.help_text: Adjusts the amount of space between the previous module/top of the flex column and the top of this module.

children.name: margin_bottom
children.label: Margin Bottom
children.help_text: Adjusts the amount of space between the bottom of this module and the module below it/the bottom of the flex column.

children.name: custom_classes
children.label: Custom Classes
children.help_text: To allow for ultimate customization through CSS you can add a class that will be added to the wrapper of this module imposing your styles onto this module.
